item.title: How I Passed the AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C02) Exam in 2025
item.description: My real-world journey passing the AWS Certified Security – Specialty (SCS-C02) exam. Study strategies, mistakes, resources, and tips for future candidates.
